name: A Night At Stina's Place
description:
This is a small game about you going to see one of your friends at their house. You expect it to be a simple and nice night but it turns out to be worse than you might expect.

I made this game alone with a major feature, most, if not all choices matter to a game-changing aspect, or at least that's what I tried to achieve.

-More than 10,000 words!

-11 working endings! (I hope)

-Branching paths and choices!

It's my first ever real game so I hope you enjoy it!
